title: Still no solution for the Mac Sound bug and FPS drop issue, even with the new 6.7. patch!!!!!!!!
body: Since 6.6 I heard from almost every player using a mac, that he has the same issues with the in game sound and FPS drops in team fights as me, how can Riot still does not react to the problem. The game is unplayable at the moment with a Mac and turning off the sound in game is not a solution, since playing with no sound is not even half the fun. Please Riot, do something

replies.body:
The team is still actively working to resolve this issue. Unfortunately,  we don't have an ETA for a fix.

**UPDATE:** There is a potential fix, it's in the process of being tested/verified. Again, no promised ETA. Again, just the messenger here, so I don't have much additional info to share. 

**SECOND UPDATE POSTED APRIL 16th**: [Update on MAC performance](http://boards.euw.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-reports-eu/jT9W0Jc1-16-04-16-update-on-mac-performance-issue).
Do you guys have any idea what could be causing the issues, or if there is some sort of work-around? I have a friend with a Mac who flat-out cannot play the game because of the FPS drops.
The work around is to disable all sound. This usually fixes it for the whole game, even if you turn sound back on, but sometimes it breaks again. Switching to classic music also helps slightly.
Are you being serious right now. disabling in game sound effects? you've tested this out?
Yes, click the Disable All Sound button in the client. It helps, but you won't be able to hear anything. Not even pings.

Thanks, KateyKhaos for a reply & the update. 

Could you beg to keep an official update every four hours here, or in a more dedicated manner. Very very frustrating issue!

please, I urge anyone active to down vote any and all Riot KateyKaos posts. There simply aren't enough answers and updates being provided. This employee needs to be shamed and we all need to participate. Submit support tickets urging Riot to take a look at his track record and also that you would like to provide feedback. If he can't update us, himself, then I expect the transfer of responsibilities to be handed off to someone capable. We demand answers. NOW!!!

Hi! 

I would strongly urge you to do the opposite, and here's why. 

As I've noted in several posts, I'm simply the messenger here, and I *do not* work on the team who is tackling the MAC issue. I'm simply relaying the information that I know. 

Please feel free to take a look at my skins track record, as I'm on the skins team, and I can assure you, I can provide much more information in terms of my personal area of expertise.  :)

That said, Riot Eambo posted [more information](http://boards.euw.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-reports-eu/jT9W0Jc1-16-04-16-update-on-mac-performance-issue) surrounding the MAC issue on the 16th.

As the messenger, please pass on my cheers to the gals and guys working on this issue. Good luck with finding a solution to the problem. 

Thanks!
Can do!
So it will be fixed as soon as the replay system is out.
Would greatly appreciate an update on how the testing is progressing, playing league without sound is not the same...

Update?  Could you please express the gravity of our predictament here?
Could you please ask another Riot staffer to show up in this thread, and clue us in on our time down. We do have demands. We are fans of the game. Human beings. Respect our wishes, please!  Update.

[serious] Hi. This isn't just a MAC issue. I don't know why this OP assumes that it is.


 The same exact things are happening on my PC. They all started after the 6.6 patch.

Tonight I heard the sound distortion in Champ Select of all places.

I'm sure that your troubleshooting team already knows this, but if not, I just wanted to add my two cents.


Also, I ran my network logs through thisweb site which analyzes your log files ( http://logsoflag.com/ ) ...and it's as I suspected, I'm not showing any big lag spikes or lost packets in these games, so leads me to think it's somehow client related.

Hi, 

Im having very low fps since patch 6.9, is this a common thing in the patch or is it just me? I went from 110-140 fps in 6.8 to Max 30 fps in 6.9.
I really dont know what is causing this issue, are you able to help me? Because playing with low fps is horrible...
{{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}

Note: Im on windows not on mac

Hey!

Sorry to hear you've started having problems with the 6.9 release. Since you mentioned you're on a Windows device, could I ask you if you're experiencing any audio-related corruption or stuttering like other players were reporting in this thread? Or are you only seeing degraded FPS? Additionally, could I ask what's normally happening in-game when you're having problems (i.e. does it only occur with certain champions or abilities? Is it happening all the time, even when walking to lane?)

Some stuff that could help would be if you could provide your [system's Dxdiag ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674#wq5) so that I can get a better idea of what kind of system you're playing on, in case the problems you mentioned are more specific to your configuration. Also, just in case you haven't seen it already, we have a support page with some common fixes for performance-related problems [here](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684#section-windows); it might be worthwhile to  run through those to try and immediately improve things so you can get back to a more playable framerate. (Also, if you don't have a ticket open already with our Player Support team, [opening one](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) is a great way to get additional help.)

Once again, sorry that your FPS is getting in the way of your games!

Also, just in case you haven't seen it already, we have a support page with some common fixes for performance-related problems [here](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684#section-windows); it might be worthwhile to  run through those to try and immediately improve things so you can get back to a more playable framerate. (Also, if you don't have a ticket open already with our Player Support team, [opening one](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) is a great way to get additional help.)

I'm not the guy ur talking to, but I have a gaming PC (not mac) and I had FPS drops in one of my first games this patch.

There was a Mordekaiser in the game.

I mention this because Mordekaiser was voiced as one of the main offenders of the mac bug. ie: it may have partially moved to Windows.

Dont worry "they are working on a fix ASAP"

/S
Was hoping for a fix in 6.7 as well. Playing without sound is rather difficult at times. Any chance we might see a hotfix soon?
Please keep asking/ demanding a first official response by Riot n response to the game breaking issue at hand
Five weeks and counting.
Asking all users to please report Riot for afk, for five weeks+++
Hello?

Updates????  

We haven't been able to play for weeks.

I'm pretty sure Riot is working on it. In the meantime I'll give you this step by step tutorial.
Step 1. Turn of your iMac
Step 2. THROW THAT PIECE OF GARBAGE OF A CLIFF 
Step 3. Burn everything that came with it, get rid of all evidence
Step 4. Build a PC
Step 5. Download league
Step 6. Enjoy!

You are an idiot. Not everyone solely uses their computer for just league.

You sound like a 14 year old PC fanboy for no reason other than you parents bought you one that youve used ever since.

I'm not gonna shoot the messenger, I know this isn't KateyKhaos' fault, but seriously Riot has to keep us updated, this issue has been going on for upwards of a month, with the only solution being to turn off all sound. Sound is an essential part of this game and turning it off shouldn't be considered a fix.
Riot does not care

SERIOUSLY
can you actually do something on it, this problem has been happened for 2 patches!

Six days ago. Lol. One weeks since any word spoken of it. Riot is trolling us/ afk
Please report

I'm anxious to see this issue resolved... My game was running fine on my MacBook Pro until the 6.6 patch. I have lowered all my graphics settings and have seen less issues, but it's still not close to being back to normal. I also turned off the in game music. I feel that turning all sound off puts me at risk for missing vital team communication.

> [{quoted}](name=TxAlly,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=bVYHPda7,comment-id=000d,timestamp=2016-04-08T04:32:56.795+0000)
>
> I'm anxious to see this issue resolved... My game was running fine on my MacBook Pro until the 6.6 patch. I have lowered all my graphics settings and have seen less issues, but it's still not close to being back to normal. I also turned off the in game music. I feel that turning all sound off puts me at risk for missing vital team communication.

I have been playing without sound for 2 weeks now because of this bug and YES
im surprised how much difference it makes by not having sound on.
not only its very difficult to have solid communication as you mentioned(literally miss most of ping communication from teammates), in mechanics stand point, its just not as same as before with reaction plays and anticipated plays without sound.

Riot said they are working with no ETA(hope they are working as hard as they say)
but the time span(2 weeks and counting) of fixing a frequent bug that is directly related to player experience seems very disappointing for many league lovers.
Roit Please come with fix soon or let us at least know you are trying to fix this problem.

Real talk this needs to be fixed asap. I have been playing like this for the past month and it is just frustrating. you have players straying away from playing the game because of this issue specific for macs

Please try to resolve this issue before patch 6.9 I have not been able to play with sound since 6.6 with no clear answer of when this will fixed. Windows people aren't the only lol players please put forth a little bit more effort it's been 2 patches since the sound bug and nothing has been done!!!!
No solution

Still not working. I assume riot knows its still not working and that fps lag and sound issues are killing the game for mac 
users. Any new info?
No solution yet
KateyKhaos fails
Talk about it
Slowly eliminating the plague known as a "Mac user". Well done Riot.
Please sir, tell us why with your seemlessly over educated brain that "Mac users" are worse than "PC users".
They will know only pain for their sin of purchasing an overly priced computer that runs less efficiently and takes an hour to change the wallpaper.
If it takes you over an hour to change a background picture on a computer, your IQ is probably lower than the RAM in your PC.
This made me laugh so hard

They replied guys.  
http://boards.euw.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-reports-eu/jT9W0Jc1-16-04-16-update-on-mac-performance-issue

Hey, I don't want to join the bandwagon and toss crap towards Riot for not having a solution to this issue, however I do feel that it is your guys job as a corporation to keep Mac users in the loop to the status of the problem, not daily but at least once a week. Six weeks is an absurd amount of time for a fix and you guys should at least try and make an effort to try and understand where we are coming from. I have personally supported riot over the years buy buying in game skins and supporting the game, but at this time I am feeling abandoned. Thanks for taking the time to read my response.

Hi all ,

i have also all these FPS drops due to sound bugs but i have also graphic bugs which never been fixed ex : Malazhar's Skills , Brand's Skills, Guardian angel, 5th drake buff
Have you those bugs too ?
Thanks for the attention Riot :)
You mean how they appear as blank white, correct? I'm having those too. Hoping for a fix.
